articles.title: Hubble’s dazzling images of star cluster captured by NASA telescope - DNA India
articles.description: Hubble’s dazzling images of star cluster captured by NASA telescope
articles.content: This image, captured by the Hubble Space Telescopes Wide Field Camera 3 (WFC3), shows the globular star cluster Omega Centauri which is located about 15,790 light-years from Earth.
